I'm a friend of the guy who requested this. I made an account just to say that you are an ingenious genius. This was so good.
Thanks! And yes I can make a transparent version. It might be Monday but I'll try for tomorrow.

See what you make of these...

Flag for Jool (Quite a simple one really).

Hmm...

The Jool one is OKAY, but I was wondering if moons could be in it too.
ExplodingRocketShips, I made that flag you wanted several months months ago already. It's here. The PM I sent you was meant to draw your attention to it.

I absolutely love that, thank you thank you thank you. Do you mind also make a transparent version of it?

Here is the version with transparency.

Could I get a flag made up? It's a bit specific but I have an example at the end.

The idea that I have is the Bell Systems logo emitting radio waves on top of a tall, black radio tower on a white background. Also, no "flag effect" with the ripples. I have a lot more that I'll do with it but I don't have the skills to make the basic foundation.

Bell Systems Logo: https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/e/ed/Bell_System_hires_1969_logo_blue.svg

Example made in paint in 1 min., the box is the flag, I don't want a box to be actually on the flag: https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-LsTcRJummKs/VI9eiRAKOjI/AAAAAAAAAlM/1F0qCg1hR80/s468/con1.png

Thanks Mate!

Any chance someone could create/resize an original Welsh flag, or the Welsh Dragon with the St. David's black and yellow cross as the background (my preference if pos). My country seems to be under-represented in space and would appreciate help from someone with the skillz.

Many Thanks
Someone can have complete freedom in designing a flag that looks like its straight out of ancient rome, but somehow sort of "kerbaly"

Any chance someone could create/resize an original Welsh flag, or the Welsh Dragon with the St. David's black and yellow cross as the background (my preference if pos). My country seems to be under-represented in space and would appreciate help from someone with the skillz.

Many Thanks

Is this it?

Someone can have complete freedom in designing a flag that looks like its straight out of ancient rome, but somehow sort of "kerbaly"

Here's what I made, feel free to let me know if you want something changed or tweeked. I was originally going to put the KÃ¢â‚¬Â¢SÃ¢â‚¬Â¢P under the smoke and an image of a space plane from Kronal Vessel Viewer in the middle, to stand in for the eagle that is often in the middle of the laurel wreath, but I didn't find any that I liked or would fit well in the space. If you want to make one yourself of a plane you made I could put it in there.
For everyone making flags, it's really cool you guys are doing this for the people that request them. They all look great!

Hi!

Could anyone help me with a Portuguese flag colors containing a yellow decoupler ring and a "Saturn V" rocket being "split" in it's separation phase?

some links:

Portuguese flag

My idea...

The arrow would be the saturn V rocket and it's first stage separation, for example...

Thanks in advance!

Hi!

Could anyone help me with a Portuguese flag colors containing a yellow decoupler ring and a "Saturn V" rocket being "split" in it's separation phase?

A couple questions that arose after I started:

  • So do you want the decoupler ring where the normal crest would be, and then the Saturn V in front of it?
  • Also, do you want the Saturn V in real colors, black and white, or do you want that colored yellow as well?
  • Should the decoupled 1st stage and the upper stages be in a straight line where it is coming apart or do you want the 1st stage at an angle like it is spinning away?
  • Do you want any wrinkly flag effects or a "distressed" pattern over it like the 1st pic you posted?

@yellow dart and captain picard:

If possible keep te rocket in straight line, in yellow and I don't mind if The ring is small! If you find it appealing it is great for me!

What you you guys suggest?

About the green/red part of the flag - I like both suggestions!:/

Thanks!

Edited January 7, 2015 by Eunito

Could anyone make a flag for me?

It should be a simple/easy enough design.. nothing too hard!


  • I want it to have the stock KSP flag feature (the rocket and the lines coming off the blast from the engine).
  • However, instead of 'Kerbal Space Program' being on it, I'd like instead to have 'CCSEI' in italics where the 'Kerbal' part would usually be.

That's it, a pretty easy task!

Thanks in advance

I'd like a cartooney-ish sort of flag, with my team's star on it, the star itself is orange, with the red, orange, and black particles coming out.

There would also be a moon (Like the ones from your Kerbin sample) and the moon is red.

Thanks! Here is the inspiration pic:

@yellow dart and captain picard:

If possible keep te rocket in straight line, in yellow and I don't mind if The ring is small! If you find it appealing it is great for me!

What you you guys suggest?

About the green/red part of the flag - I like both suggestions!:/

Thanks!

Sorry I know I implied I'd do it ages ago, but I just couldn't think of anything that looked good.

@yellow dart and captain picard:

If possible keep te rocket in straight line, in yellow and I don't mind if The ring is small! If you find it appealing it is great for me!

What you you guys suggest?

About the green/red part of the flag - I like both suggestions!:/

Thanks!

How about this? Any thoughts? The rocket will be hard to see when on the side of a ship, but it is so long and skinny I can really make it too much bigger and keep it all on the flag.
Shameless thread bump?

Shameless thread bump?
I started on yours but I kept making stupid mistakes and I got mad and quit. It's what I get for learning Photoshop from YouTube & Google. I'll probably get around to it when I get some more time. Also, the last 3 I did here got no response from the requester, I prefer to get some closure before moving on to a new one.

I started on yours but I kept making stupid mistakes and I got mad and quit. It's what I get for learning Photoshop from YouTube & Google. I'll probably get around to it when I get some more time. Also, the last 3 I did here got no response from the requester, I prefer to get some closure before moving on to a new one.

Haha, no worries Thanks for giving it a shot, I look forward to possibly seeing it in the future

I have been using this flag for some time now (it's my friends Halo clan insignia pasted onto a white background). It is... a work of art.

I was wondering if someone would like to fix her up like this (as I am terrible with photoshop):

-smooth out rough edges on picture (aka better picture resolution)

-give it a black background, fading to grey near the edges of the flag
